segments.text: Tell me something about your work experience .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I have been in the computer engineering field for 6 years now . I am familiar with both hardware and software and with hands-on experience in system development including system analysis and design .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What systems have you worked on ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have worked on about every system that is out right now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you feel comfortable with the new system by microcosm ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am not as familiar with it as I am with some of the older systems . But I am a fast learner and I can master it in a short time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you consider your strengths ?
segments.speaker: S1
